Title: Taylor Swift Triggered a Tsunami of Sports Bets. Then She Stopped Turning Up
Description:
The singer generated millions in prop bets for the Kansas City Chiefs just by showing up to watch her boyfriend play.
Now that she’s busy, gamblers are losing interest.

Title: Belarus election: 'There is no alternative to Lukashenko'
Description: Even "rival" candidates support the current leader staying in power, Steve Rosenberg finds in Belarus.

Title: The Zuckermoon is over
Description:
Mark Zuckerberg was popular and cool for the last 18 months.
That has all seemed to shift since moderation changes at Meta and Trump's inauguration.

Title: I got a job at Deloitte but was miserable and quit at 24. Now I'm doing what I love and will never go back.
Description:
Nicole Chan Loeb joined Deloitte as a management after college.
She hated the hustle culture and quit two years later to start her own photography business.

Title: A former soldier in North Korea's army says he was restricted to firing 3 bullets a year
Description: Hyunseung Lee, a former soldier who fled North Korea, told BI that those sent to fight against Ukraine have "zero relationship with modern warfare."

Title: Dropbox's CEO says a challenging time at the startup taught him a valuable lesson about 'getting your head right'
Description: Drew Houston, the cofounder and CEO of Dropbox, recently shared his strategies for tackling burnout in the face of a hard time in a podcast interview.

Title: The companies fighting back against Trump's war on DEI
Description: JPMorgan and Costco say DEI efforts help drive innovation and success, though other companies like Meta and Walmart are scaling back policies.

Title: The (Real) Problem With Fake Plants
Description:
They are seemingly everywhere.
But they are no substitute for the joy real foliage brings.

Title: Trump, Putin signal they'll have a phone call soon. What will they talk about?
Description: It would the first U.S.-Russian leader contact in nearly three years.

Title: New Evidence Bolsters Theory of Megaflood That Refilled the Mediterranean Millions of Years Ago
Description: Researchers identified geological features that point to a single massive flooding event that refilled the Mediterranean Sea 5.33 million years ago

Title: Kidnappers sever finger of cryptocurrency millionaire David Balland
Description: A violent 24-hour kidnapping of Ledger co-founder David Balland and his wife ended in their rescue by French police following demands for cryptocurrency ransom.

Title: Joints Are the Ultimate Flex

Title: A PlayStation-branded fitness tracker exists, and I want one
Description: Ever wanted a PlayStation-branded fitness tracker? Sony and Xiaomi have teamed up to launch this wearable.

Title: Manga Publishers Maintain Pressure Despite Pirate Countermeasures
Description:
Japan's major manga publishers are facing perhaps the most complex set of piracy challenges ever seen online.
With limited options to have a visible and sustainable impact short term, solid foundations below the surface seem destined to pay off in the future.…

Title: Glenn Close, James Mangold, and Marielle Heller Are ‘Totally in Awe’ of Sundance’s Michelle Satter
Description: Sundance 2025: Michelle Satter, the founding director of the non-profit's filmmaker labs, was showered with praise at the festival's annual gala.

Title: ‘If I Had Legs I’d Kick You,’ Starring a Sensational Rose Byrne, Is a Welcome Shock to Sundance’s System
Description: Sundance: After Mary Bronstein's exhilarating, big-screen anxiety attack premiered, co-star Conan O'Brien said he's surprised the amazing Byrne wasn't hospitalized after filming.

Title: ‘Jimpa’ Review: Olivia Colman and John Lithgow Star in a Muddled LGBT Family Drama
Description: Sundance: Colman plays a filmmaker struggling to reconcile her resentment toward her gay father in Sophie Hyde's thinly rendered portrait of generational divides.
